Structs/ComposableRequest.html#/s:4Ombi1.abstract: Replace the existing headers with new ones

Structs/ComposableRequest.html#/s:4Ombi1.abstract: Replace the existing headers with new ones

Structs/ComposableRequest.html#/s:4Ombi1.abstract: Add a fallback response to the request

Structs/ComposableRequest.html#/s:4Ombi1.abstract: Add a fallback response to the request

Structs/BodyEncoder.html#/s:4Ombi11BodyE.abstract: Create an encoder for a Codable using a JSONEncoder

Structs/BodyDecoder.html#/s:4Ombi11BodyD.abstract: A fatal decoder that will cause a runtime failure

Structs/BodyDecoder.html#/s:4Ombi11BodyD.abstract: Create a decoder for a Codable using a JSONDecoder

Structs/BodyDecoder.html.name: BodyDecoder
Structs/BodyDecoder.html.abstract: A generic value type to decode response body content from Data

Structs/BodyEncoder.html.name: BodyEncoder
Structs/BodyEncoder.html.abstract: A generic value type to encode request body content as Data

Structs/ComposableRequest.html.name: ComposableRequest
Structs/ComposableRequest.html.abstract: A ComposableRequest is a generic type used to execute HTTP requests without needing to create request-specific Requestable types.

Structs/ResponseValidator.html.name: ResponseValidator
Structs/ResponseValidator.html.abstract: A value type used to validate a RequestResponse

Structs/RequestHeaders.html.name: RequestHeaders
Structs/RequestHeaders.html.abstract: RequestHeaders is a value type that stores mapping of header keys an their values.

Structs/AnyJSON.html.name: AnyJSON
Structs/AnyJSON.html.abstract: A generic JSON value type that can be expressed with Swift Literals

Structs/AnyRequestable.html.name: AnyRequestable
Structs/AnyRequestable.html.abstract: A type erased Requestable wrapper, with no other functional differences.

Protocols/Requestable.html#/s:4Ombi11Req.name: RequestBody
Protocols/Requestable.html#/s:4Ombi11Req.abstract: The body type to be sent with this request

Protocols/Requestable.html#/s:4Ombi11Req.name: ResponseBody
Protocols/Requestable.html#/s:4Ombi11Req.abstract: The body type to expect from the response

Protocols/Requestable.html#/s:4Ombi11Req.name: Response
Protocols/Requestable.html#/s:4Ombi11Req.abstract: The specialized response to be returned by this request

Protocols/Requestable.html#/s:4Ombi11Req.name: Failure
Protocols/Requestable.html#/s:4Ombi11Req.abstract: The specialized error to be generated by this request

Protocols/Requestable.html#/s:4Ombi11Req.name: body
Protocols/Requestable.html#/s:4Ombi11Req.abstract: The body to append to the request

Protocols/Requestable.html#/s:4Ombi11Req.name: fallbackResponse
Protocols/Requestable.html#/s:4Ombi11Req.abstract: The response to use if the request fails

Protocols/Requestable.html#/s:4Ombi11Req.name: responseValidator
Protocols/Requestable.html#/s:4Ombi11Req.abstract: Validator used to check a fully constructoed RequestResponse for errors

Protocols/Requestable.html.name: Requestable
Protocols/Requestable.html.abstract: A Requestable is an interfaces for types that express the details of an HTTP request

Protocols/AutomaticBodyEncoding.html.name: AutomaticBodyEncoding
Protocols/AutomaticBodyEncoding.html.abstract: A protocol for types that can be expressed as Data

Protocols/AutomaticBodyDecoding.html.name: AutomaticBodyDecoding
Protocols/AutomaticBodyDecoding.html.abstract: A protocol for types that can be initialized from Data provided by a network response

Protocols.html#/s:4Ombi11HTTPRequestP.name: HTTPRequest
Protocols.html#/s:4Ombi11HTTPRequestP.abstract: A Requestable with basic HTTP status code based response validation

Protocols.html#/s:4Ombi7RequestP.name: Request
Protocols.html#/s:4Ombi7RequestP.abstract: A Requestable with no validated – all completed requests will be considered safe regardless of status code, headers, or body

Enums/RequestMethod.html.abstract: An enumeration defining HTTP methods as detailed in RFC 7231 4.3

Classes/RequestManager.html#/s:4Ombi14Re.abstract: Whether or not to inject Ombi’s default headers

Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
